text: Girolamo Odam (1681- after 1718) was an Italian painter of the Baroque period. Born in Rome to a family from Lorena, he trained under Carlo Maratta. He was recognized as a pastel portraitist and landscape artist, as well as wood engraver. ==References== * Category:1681 births Category:17th-century Italian painters Category:Italian male painters Category:18th-century Italian painters Category:Italian Baroque painters Category:Year of death unknown Category:Pupils of Carlo Maratta
title: Girolamo Odam
